rows.label: tlk43700143_01_msg0001
rows.name: Oh, here comes a promising one!

rows.label: tlk43700143_01_msg0002
rows.name:
You're here to apply for our Merc
Group, right?

rows.label: tlk43700143_01_msg0003
rows.name:
For you, I think we can make an
exception. We'll hire you straight up,
no demonstration of skills needed.

rows.label: tlk43700143_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, just remember, you're always
welcome!

rows.label: tlk43700143_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Any time you're pressed for money
or you want a good fight, just come
over to us, yeah?

rows.label: tlk43700143_01_msg0101
rows.name:
Been a while since you
paid us a visit, bossman.

rows.label: tlk43700143_01_msg0102
rows.name:
It's rare for you to come all the way
to Fons Maim.

rows.label: tlk43700143_01_msg0103
rows.name:
Here on business, I take it?
If it's something good, let me in
on it, will ya?
